description: Create function to analyze QA log files and classify failures as critical (test failures, build errors) or non-critical (documentation, formatting, style issues)
Modify run_qa_for_agent() to call severity detection function and store QA severity (critical/non-critical) in agent state JSON file

Update check_dependencies() function to read QA severity from dependency agent state files and allow tasks to proceed if dependencies failed with non-critical QA issues, only blocking on critical failures
Update status handling logic to distinguish between critical and non-critical QA failures in status reporting and dependency checks throughout orchestrate-agents
